duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify, develop, and support the selection of new equipment and processes for enterprise use.
Apply engineering techniques to drive cost reduction and ensure high quality.
Independently develop clear objectives for assignments, contributing to long-term thinking.
Develop expertise as a subject matter expert on manufacturing equipment.
Provide guidance to co-ops, technicians, and other engineers, and lead assigned projects of moderate to large scope.
Assess current manufacturing equipment and processes, making recommendations for improvements.
Identify, create, and apply best practices and standards within the operations group.
Provide analytical problem-solving and process troubleshooting support in area of expertise.
Actively support the development of co-ops, technicians, and engineers.
Communicate progress through management updates and team meetings.

education_certification.credential: BS degree in Engineering or related field
